Indian Economy.title: One Big Beautiful Bubble: Oracle, Amazon, Microsoft, Google, Meta Platforms, Palantir et al in the danger zone?
Indian Economy.summary: With just the top 10 AI stocks valued at nearly $25 trillion and capex by a few companies driving a good part of US GDP growth, too much rides on too few for the US economy

Indian Economy.title: Donald Trump’s H-1B annual fee hike to $100,000 sparks debate; Amitabh Kant says innovation will move to Bengaluru, Gurgaon: ‘America’s loss will be India’s gain’
Indian Economy.summary: The US administration said the hike is intended to ensure that only “truly highly skilled” workers enter the country and that American jobs are protected.

Indian Economy.title: Bihar Assembly polls on the horizon, Nitish Kumar govt steps up welfare spending on women, youth
Indian Economy.summary: Among its new schemes are monthly allowances to women entrepreneurs and unemployed youth. Combined with other recent schemes, the government’s annual expenditure is set to rise by Rs 40,000 crore.

Indian Economy.title: Wrong time for dollar diversification
Indian Economy.summary: Indian investors should carefully consider the risks before switching to US stocks due to rupee depreciation concerns.

Indian Economy.title: Bamboo, the untapped engine of India’s green economy
Indian Economy.summary: If India chooses and repositions bamboo, it can capture a global opportunity, empower its rural workforce and lead the world in building a sustainable, inclusive bamboo economy

Banking & Finance.title: Bank holiday today: Are banks open or closed on Saturday, September 20? Check here
Banking & Finance.summary: Bank holiday today: According to the Reserve Bank of India bank holiday calendar (RBI), banks are closed on the second and fourth Saturdays and all Sundays each month. Usually, banks remain closed on weekends, except on the first, third, and fifth Saturdays.

Banking & Finance.summary: Helpline to share data, insights generated from consumer complaints with concerned companies, CBIC and other concerned authorities to enable timely action under relevant laws

Banking & Finance.title: Dark Diwali: H-1B visa fee hike plunges IT companies, employees into chaos
Banking & Finance.summary: With Diwali around the corner, many H-1B visa holders had planned short trips to visit family, celebrate the festival, and recharge before returning to their jobs in the US. They now face an uncertain future, as does the entire IT sector.

Technology Sector.summary: Trump on Friday signed a measure restricting the entry of H-1B visa holders and raising the annual application fee to $100,000.
